messages.title: Who will really fight for our NHS?
messages.content: Labour is letting us down. Their support is crumbling. They are too busy fighting each other to fight for our NHS.

messages.title: The NHS and the most vulnerable are being hit hard...
messages.content: Widowed parents are being hit again by Tory cuts to bereavement benefits. NHS cuts blamed for 30,000 deaths in new study. Schools face the worst funding cuts in 20 years.

messages.title: and Labour is letting us down by failing to stop it.
messages.content: Only the Lib Dems will fight the Tories on NHS and school cuts.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Lib Dems pledge to spend twice as much on education as Labour and to increase Income Tax by a penny for every earner to fund a £6bn-a-year cash injection for the NHS and social care.

issues.health: The NHS is in its darkest hour, and Labour and Tory cuts have severely impacted it, causing significant harm to vulnerable individuals. Only the Lib Dems pledge substantial funding increases.
issues.socialWelfare: Tory cuts to bereavement benefits have hit widowed parents hard; Lib Dems propose increased funding.

images.caption: In the NHS's darkest hour... Labour is letting us down.
